channel.title: code-jam on The long way through Software Craftsmanship
channel.description: Recent content in code-jam on The long way through Software Craftsmanship

item.title: GMaur code jam 2015: 01 - Mini-Power Swapper
item.description: Last year we started the program 12 months, 12 katas (as inspired by this repository). This year we want to propose something different: an asynchronous code jam New problem: Mini-Power Swapper This post belongs to a series: code-jam Each month (or so) we at GMaur will publish a new problem (and announce it on twitter) and post a solution to the last problem. This month, the Mini-Power Swapper You can fork the repo, commit there and send a pull request.
